KFunction.Name: fnGetCityBasedOnZip
KFunction.Desc: This function will return the City name based on the input Zip Code. The function will translate the City name using the refZipCodes Global Container
KFunction.FunctionBody: // Get the City name from the hcZipCodes Global Container. return (String)DBSelectValue(DB_INTERFACE_NAME, "SELECT primary_city FROM refZipCodes WHERE zip="+'"'+iZip+'"', null);

Input.name: iZip
Input.Comment: The Zip Code based on which to return the city name
